text: Wonder what I should say here.....
Ah. I know. My name.
I suppose that 'Len' should do for now.
Im just some wage slave working for peanuts, if anything.
Taking this bit a little far, don't you think?
Nah, I'm not even joking. Im literally working for nothing.
Im confined to this instant noodle lifestyle.
Help is what I need, not going to lie.
I sure wish I could travel, but I am very broke.
Unfortunately, this is perfectly legal in this country.
Pretty much, state-sanctioned slavery.
Help is what i need, not going to lie.
Huh, I repeated myself. AN odd coincidence.
NOT. This is what my life feels like on an endless repeat.
Can't a magical door that wisks me away exist in my attic?'
Pull up a chair, crack out the popcorn.
Is that a bit too premium for me?
Appearently so. Instead I get to live while life uses me as a human pinata.
My boss is all like 'LEN! Get me that report done today. And you can't go home until then.'
At least the tiny bit of fun I get is reading fake passports.
Or details that sound so fake, until you read them.
Like 'Bin Bin Ng' or 'MY70VE9587@GMEIL.COM'
